Entries.DialogueText: Oh, a stranger! My name's Vincent.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, a stranger! My name's Vincent.

Entries.DialogueText: Momma says not to talk to strangers... But you seem okay.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Momma says not to talk to strangers... But you seem okay.

Entries.DialogueText: Is that a birthday present? Can I open it now?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is that a birthday present? Can I open it now?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, wow! This is exactly what I wanted! Yayayaya! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, wow! This is exactly what I wanted! Yayayaya!

Entries.DialogueText: A birthday present? Oh... this isn't very fun. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A birthday present? Oh... this isn't very fun.

Entries.DialogueText: Wow! It's so sweet! Mmmmm....
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow! It's so sweet! Mmmmm....

Entries.DialogueText: *Squish* *squish* ... Ewww! Can I have it? Can I have it? Yaaay! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Squish* *squish* ... Ewww! Can I have it? Can I have it? Yaaay!

Entries.DialogueText: Mom! I wanna go outside and play!%noturn
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mom! I wanna go outside and play!

Entries.DialogueText: Vincent is covered in moss.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Vincent is covered in moss.

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff*... what is this? It smells awful... Mommmm!!! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff*... what is this? It smells awful... Mommmm!!!

Entries.DialogueText: That was fun! I wanna be a boat captain some day!
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was fun! I wanna be a boat captain some day!

Entries.DialogueText: I wanna come back soon!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanna come back soon!

Entries.DialogueText: I wanna see a shark! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanna see a shark!

Entries.DialogueText: Don't take my Sammy away! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't take my Sammy away!

Entries.DialogueText: If you look close, you can see little bugs jumping out of the sand. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you look close, you can see little bugs jumping out of the sand.

Entries.DialogueText: Oooh! Nice find!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oooh! Nice find!

Entries.DialogueText: Mom wouldn't let me keep him, though... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mom wouldn't let me keep him, though...

Entries.DialogueText: I wanna be just like my big brother when I grow up! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanna be just like my big brother when I grow up!

Entries.DialogueText: Okay! Bye!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay! Bye!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad Dad's back... but he's different than I remember... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad Dad's back... but he's different than I remember...

Entries.DialogueText: Dad's not around much... I miss playing with him. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dad's not around much... I miss playing with him.

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... Mom won't let me have any more gummies today. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... Mom won't let me have any more gummies today.

Entries.DialogueText: Can you keep a secret, mister?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Can you keep a secret, mister?

Entries.DialogueText: Can you keep a secret, miss? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Can you keep a secret, miss?

Entries.DialogueText: I wanna marry Miss Penny when I grow up.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanna marry Miss Penny when I grow up.

Entries.DialogueText: Just don't tell her, okay? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just don't tell her, okay?

Entries.DialogueText: I wanna look for bugs, but Mom gets mad when I'm all dirty. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanna look for bugs, but Mom gets mad when I'm all dirty.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a tough choice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a tough choice.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm hungry... where's Mom? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm hungry... where's Mom?

Entries.DialogueText: You're not as boring as most grown-ups!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're not as boring as most grown-ups!

Entries.DialogueText: Ew, it's boiled beet night again... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ew, it's boiled beet night again...

Entries.DialogueText: $e
Entries.DisplayPattern: $e

Entries.DialogueText: Oh no... Mom's making lentil soup tonight. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh no... Mom's making lentil soup tonight.

Entries.DialogueText: Dad's coming back soon!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dad's coming back soon!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope he brings me some toys. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope he brings me some toys.

Entries.DialogueText: Miss Penny makes me read a new book every week. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Miss Penny makes me read a new book every week.

Entries.DialogueText: At least she lets me pick them, sometimes!
Entries.DisplayPattern: At least she lets me pick them, sometimes!

Entries.DialogueText: Dad seems weird since he came back. I wonder what happened to him? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dad seems weird since he came back. I wonder what happened to him?

Entries.DialogueText: He doesn't play with me anymore. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: He doesn't play with me anymore.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if Dad will ever come home... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if Dad will ever come home...

Entries.DialogueText: Hi there, mister!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi there, mister!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi there, miss.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi there, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi Uncle {Farmer_Name}!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi Uncle !

Entries.DialogueText: Hi Auntie {Farmer_Name}!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi Auntie !

Entries.DialogueText: Don't tell Mom... but you're my favorite grown-up. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't tell Mom... but you're my favorite grown-up.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm really excited, Sam!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm really excited, Sam!

Entries.DialogueText: OK!
Entries.DisplayPattern: OK!

Entries.DialogueText: Me too!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Me too!

Entries.DialogueText: Does this mean I don't have to do my homework? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Does this mean I don't have to do my homework?

Entries.DialogueText: I've been thinking about cake a lot lately...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been thinking about cake a lot lately...

Entries.DialogueText: Sam...? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam...?

Entries.DialogueText: Is Dad ever going to come home? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is Dad ever going to come home?

Entries.DialogueText: But I heard some grown-ups saying that... that all of our troops are getting shot to pieces. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I heard some grown-ups saying that... that all of our troops are getting shot to pieces.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay!

Entries.DialogueText: Mr. {Farmer_Name}, are you going to marry Miss Penny? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mr. , are you going to marry Miss Penny?

Entries.DialogueText: Ms. {Farmer_Name}... Um, do you have a boyfriend?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ms. ... Um, do you have a boyfriend?

Entries.DialogueText: Um, Farmer {Farmer_Name}? If I eat your veggies will I grow up strong like my big brother Sam?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um, Farmer ? If I eat your veggies will I grow up strong like my big brother Sam?

Entries.DialogueText: He's so strong, I saw him lift Miss Penny clear off the ground last night when they were climbing into a tree. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: He's so strong, I saw him lift Miss Penny clear off the ground last night when they were climbing into a tree.

Entries.DialogueText: Farmer {Farmer_Name}? Can I put a saddle on one of your cows and ride it into town? I wanna be a real cowboy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Farmer ? Can I put a saddle on one of your cows and ride it into town? I wanna be a real cowboy!

Entries.DialogueText: Farmer {Farmer_Name}? Is it true that goblins live deep in the caves... and that they like to kidnap little girls for their dinner?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Farmer ? Is it true that goblins live deep in the caves... and that they like to kidnap little girls for their dinner?

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Sad}
Why is it locked? I wanna explore the sewers! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why is it locked? I wanna explore the sewers!

Entries.DialogueText: Professor Gunther? The man who runs the museum? Why do you think he has it? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Professor Gunther? The man who runs the museum? Why do you think he has it?

Entries.DialogueText: Hiya, mister {Farmer_Name}!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hiya, mister !

Entries.DialogueText: Hiya, miss {Farmer_Name}!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hiya, miss !

Entries.DialogueText: Sp..spwing onion. Mom sends me out to pick these sometimes...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sp..spwing onion. Mom sends me out to pick these sometimes...

Entries.DialogueText: You're really nice for a grown-up... so I'm going to show you a secret. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're really nice for a grown-up... so I'm going to show you a secret.

Entries.DialogueText: When you see it like this, it looks good, right?
Entries.DisplayPattern: When you see it like this, it looks good, right?

Entries.DialogueText: But if you peel it a little bit...
Entries.DisplayPattern: But if you peel it a little bit...

Entries.DialogueText: ...It's full of bugs! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...It's full of bugs!

Entries.DialogueText: Cool, huh? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Cool, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: Usually I just squash 'em!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Usually I just squash 'em!

Entries.DialogueText: Moooo!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Moooo!

Entries.DialogueText: Can I play the slingshot game again, Dad!? Please? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Can I play the slingshot game again, Dad!? Please?

Entries.DialogueText: Mother won't let me go in the maze. *sob* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mother won't let me go in the maze. *sob*

Entries.DialogueText: Did we beat the maze? Where's my prize? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did we beat the maze? Where's my prize?

Entries.DialogueText: When does the egg hunt start?! I'm so excited!! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: When does the egg hunt start?! I'm so excited!!

Entries.DialogueText: I want to live inside a big egg!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I want to live inside a big egg!

Entries.DialogueText: That's not fair... Why can't I be the flower queen?
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's not fair... Why can't I be the flower queen?

Entries.DialogueText: If there's a flower queen... there must be a flower king! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If there's a flower queen... there must be a flower king!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm bored...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm bored...

Entries.DialogueText: Why can't I go play by the tide pools? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why can't I go play by the tide pools?

Entries.DialogueText: I wanna see the rare green jelly!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanna see the rare green jelly!

Entries.DialogueText: I touched a jelly once and it stung my hand. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I touched a jelly once and it stung my hand.

Entries.DialogueText: Can we open presents now?!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Can we open presents now?!

Entries.DialogueText: I got the toy dinosaur I wanted! See!? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I got the toy dinosaur I wanted! See!?

Entries.DialogueText: It's called um... a ste-...stego-...stegosonaurus! ...I think. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's called um... a ste-...stego-...stegosonaurus! ...I think.

Entries.DialogueText: I saw a big fish down there!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I saw a big fish down there!

Entries.DialogueText: My big brother is helping me build a snowman! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My big brother is helping me build a snowman!

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, thank you so much! This is terrific!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, thank you so much! This is terrific!

Entries.DialogueText: For me? Wow, thanks!
Entries.DisplayPattern: For me? Wow, thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: This isn't very fun... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This isn't very fun...

Entries.DialogueText: Yuck, what is this? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yuck, what is this?

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm so excited! My mom said I can have candy, too! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm so excited! My mom said I can have candy, too!

Entries.DialogueText: Vincent is having a blast!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Vincent is having a blast!

Entries.DialogueText: That was so fun! I wanna go see it again! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was so fun! I wanna go see it again!

Entries.DialogueText: B... But... This movie is for grown-ups, isn't it? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: B... But... This movie is for grown-ups, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: Vincent is fidgeting in his seat.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Vincent is fidgeting in his seat.

Entries.DialogueText: That was boring... I didn't understand anything. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was boring... I didn't understand anything.

Entries.DialogueText: Mom, I'm bored!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mom, I'm bored!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi! Um... I found some stuff. Wanna buy it!?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi! Um... I found some stuff. Wanna buy it!?
